trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Coldwater
There were no other sightings in Coldwater on or around August 31st 1973
divs: sighting detailswe were shooting skeet in the back of our trailer sales lot called "wh" east ofus 12 in coldwater, mi. i was suprised to see over the fence, 1\4 mile away, atop like craft with legs. it was off white and it was round like a top andnarrowed down like a funnel. about 30 ft. wide. it looked like it had 4 legsand it had lights, 1 on top and 3 lights i could see on the bottom. i guess thelights drew my attention.i was so shocked and couldnt believe a real ufo. i called my dad, andbrothers, and people also who were looking at a trailer and friends came tolook. we watched it for 10-12 minutes. all it did was hover above a tree. mydad said he could see something moving around on the inside. he was using asmall telescope. i also noticed 3 u.s. air force planes circling for about 30minutes. the ufo all at once disappeared. we still cant believe what we saw,but we all know we saw a ufo.
Summary: Toplike object with legs seen in Coldwater, Michig
